On January 29, looters swarmed into the archaeological site of Saqqara, an ancient burial ground known for its pyramids and many surrounding tombs. Reports circulated about damage to the tombs and their beautiful reliefs. All the sites are safe, said Minister of Antiquities Zahi Hawass .`` Nothing stolen, nothing destroyed.''
